channel.title: Subtitles dont showing
channel.description: the subtitles dont show i just install the game correctly.. sorry for the bad english. im Spanish

item.title: Subtitles dont showing
item.dc:creator: Samapico
item.description:
I have the same issue. Subtitles won’t show… It might be related: In the audio options, the only language option I have is ‘Français’ (French)… The dialogues are still in English, of course, but I have a feeling it tries to find french subtitles or something, and can’t find them. Any idea how to change the language?

Edit: Nevermind

https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showthread.php?t=12725&highlight=subtitles

Change the language of the Steam client to English

Read full topic
